Interface BeverageController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface BeverageController
    Interface for beverage controllers.

    Christopher D. Canfield

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addObserver​(BeverageControllerObserver observer)
      Adds the specified observer to this beverage controller.

      Removes the specified observer from this beverage controller.

    • Method Detail

      • state

        BeverageController.State state()
        Returns the current state of the beverage controller.
        Returns:
        the current state of the beverage controller.

      • submitOrder

        void submitOrder​(BeverageOrder order)
        Submits a drink order to the BeverageController. The controller will notify its observers of its progress using the BeverageControllerObserver callback methods.
        Parameters:
        order - the drink order to process.

      • addObserver

        void addObserver​(BeverageControllerObserver observer)
        Adds the specified observer to this beverage controller.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer to add.

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver​(BeverageControllerObserver observer)
        Removes the specified observer from this beverage controller. If the
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer to remove.
